Detailed Description

The name server will stock all the tree in the disk, with the operation of initialize we will create the principal directory where we will store after all the others directories. After it we will make a connection for each request of the client. The configuration of the server use the properties read from $HOME/kaapi.rc and $PWD/kaapi.rc as well as the parsing options from the command line. 'nameserver.gid' <url> : set the binding address of the server object. 'nameserver.rootdir' <pathname> : set the root directory, default '.'. 'nameserver.dumpurl' <filename> : dump the binding of the nameserver to the file.
